verbs.description: [V: Surrounded] [ARG1: by a throng of reporters and well - groomed PR professionals] , [ARG2: the self - proclaimed " first Trump lady "] introduced her latest project — a national campaign against adult obesity — in partnership with Italian businessman and nutritionist Gianluca Mech .
